name: Alien Box
description:
Description 

Puzzle game, Sokoban style with extra elements for a better challenge to the player, the game is divided into 7 stages, going easier to the more difficult.

You can also track how many steps you took to complete the phase, and try to reduce that amount by considering other ways to address these challenges. The game has arrows to use the mouse to move, or you can use the arrow keys, is at the discretion of the player.

The game has instructions on the functioning of the elements of the game, and for convenience the games are in Portuguese and English, and can be modified in the options screen.
